channel.title: 508 questions. ~CODERS PLEASE HELP~
channel.description:
hey there.
i have a few questions about 508 servers and was hoping for someone to help me out. so here we go :
1. How do i make shops? 2. How do i change where you first log in? 3. How do i make quests? 4. How do i change what npc's say when you talk to them? 5. How do i put npcs on the map and change what they drop?
I think thats all for now but if theres anyone that can help me please i would really appreciate it!.
thanks..

item.title: 508 questions. ~CODERS PLEASE HELP~
item.dc:creator: @Maxim706 Maxim706
item.description:
@Maxim706 wrote:

alright to change when you log in, you want to go into your server files and look for login.java Once you find that search for what the current log in text is and change that.

for example if it says welcome to Jestascape when you log in, you would search for Jestascape in the login.java file and then change it to whatever you want. Don’t forget to compile once you finish!

oh and quests are a bit complicated, i recommend not trying that until you read up on some tutorials about NPC dialogues.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 questions. ~CODERS PLEASE HELP~
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

1. How do i make shops? 2. How do i change where you first log in? 3. How do i make quests? 4. How do i change what npc's say when you talk to them? 5. How do i put npcs on the map and change what they drop?
  1. I forgot which class, but I think it is in the Player class or the ShopHandler class…
  2. Login class
  3. Search for it.
  4. NPCDialogue class
  5. NPCDrops class and npcspawn.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: 508 questions. ~CODERS PLEASE HELP~
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Have you ever programmed a server before? Because for beginners, 508 is harder than 317. A lot of it is done from scratch at the moment.
